title: riven ult nerf
body:
The recent nerf was suppose to stop riven from getting easy kill with the ult, but the speed or animation looks very out of place. you made it so that it can be dodged by some moves but currently, it is too slow, from speed 2200 to 1600 is a dramatic decrease in speed. 

The ult can be easily walked out of on the outer areas of her ult, without loosing anything

is it just me or does it go too slow and out of place
(not my video owner is foxxy youtube account user foxxy  box)
